name: A Wormy Journey
description:
A Wormy Journey is a challenging platformer with unique controls. Manipulate the grab of a worm to find your way to the legendary great cake island. Similar in feel to games like "Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy" and "Heave Ho!". A vindictive bird spots the hapless hero and barrages it with insults. 

How to Play:

Press and hold A to grab with your tail

Press and hold D to grab with your head

Once grabbing, you can rotate with Left and Right Mouse Button

You can compress the worm with Shift and Space

Alternate holding D + Right Mouse then A + Left Mouse to move quickly
